# The `ThreadSafeTrieRawHashMap` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Lock-free thread-safe hash-mapped trie. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class T, size&#95;t NumHashBytes&gt;
class llvm::ThreadSafeTrieRawHashMap&lt;T, NumHashBytes&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsafetrierawhashmapbase">ThreadSafeTrieRawHashMapBase</a></>}>
TrieRawHashMap - is a lock-free thread-safe trie that is can be used to store/index data based on a hash value. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsafetrierawhashmapbase/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Lock-free thread-safe hash-mapped trie.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Insert with a hint.

Default-constructed hint will work, but it&#39;s recommended to start with a lookup to avoid overhead in object creation if it already exists.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/trierawhashmap-h/#l00314">314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/trierawhashmap-h">TrieRawHashMap.h</a>.
